de.erichseifert.gral.plots

Class PiePlot.PieSliceRenderer

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.settings.BasicSettingsStorage
      • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.points.AbstractPointRenderer
        • de.erichseifert.gral.plots.PiePlot.PieSliceRenderer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    PointRenderer, SettingsListener, SettingsStorage, Serializable
    Enclosing class:
    PiePlot

    public static class PiePlot.PieSliceRenderer
extends AbstractPointRenderer
    A point renderer for a single slice in a pie plot.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • drawValueLabel

        protected void drawValueLabel(DrawingContext context,
                  PiePlot.Slice slice,
                  double radius,
                  Row row,
                  int col)
        Draws the specified value label for the specified shape.
        Parameters:
        context - Environment used for drawing.
        slice - Pie slice to draw.
        radius - Radius of pie slice in view units (e.g. pixels).
        row - Data row containing the point.
        col - Index of the column that will be projected on the axis.
